name: font-feature-abettings
description: Highlight OpenType features based on a font’s provided data.
author: Kenneth Ormandy <hello@kennethormandy.com> (http://kennethormandy.com)

scripts.start: npm run watch-js & harp server -p 9040 & open http://localhost:9040/test
scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified…yet! Pull requests on kennethormandy/font-feature-abetting are greatly appriciated." && exit 1
